heading: Data Ownership
content: Do live shopping with access to all customer data points, metrics, and analytics, including customer name & verified mobile number, all interaction touchpoints, average time spent, etc.

heading: Real-Time Analytics
content: Get access to real-time engagement analytics, video analytics, and predictive sales â€” right from the dashboard. Use these enhanced analytics to make smart decisions and optimize your success.

heading: Predict Conversion
content: Deliver a truly immersive experience by curating recommendations based on real-time analytics and make it fun for your customers to shop. Assign a score to each lead and predict customer conversion.
